title: Club still unaccessable.
body:
Preface: I am the owner of a club named Uncle Ryze's Cabin with the tag URC. The club still exists, and the members are still in it (including me, according to another member), however I cannot access the club.

Solution: Through Riot's support, I was informed that there was a fix in progress. I know that many people are now back to normal through some fix or another.

Problem: I still have no access to my club.

I would appreciate some communication on this matter. If a fix is still being found, that's fine, but I'd like to know that my case hasn't been forgotten

Thank you for your time,
The Grand Design

replies.body: We've already resolved this for most players, so we're actually resolving the remaining issues in [support tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I recommend you submit one so we can resolve this with you.

I have this same issue.

I've seen plenty of resolves, though, where people have gotten their accounts refreshed.

Its just a matter of waiting, I believe, as I assume they're getting a ton of these reports.
